name: The Riftbreaker Dedicated Server (SteamCMD + Wine)
author: Brandon
description: Installs The Riftbreaker Dedicated Server (Steam Tool AppID 4114030) via SteamCMD and runs it with Wine. Requires allocations: UDP 6321 (game) and TCP 1127 (matchmaking/handshake).

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

cd /mnt/server

APP_ID="4114030"
INSTALL_DIR="/mnt/server"

# Build optional beta args
BETA_ARGS=""
if [[ -n "${STEAM_BETA_BRANCH:-}" ]]; then
  BETA_ARGS+=" -beta ${STEAM_BETA_BRANCH}"
  if [[ -n "${STEAM_BETA_PASSWORD:-}" ]]; then
    BETA_ARGS+=" -betapassword ${STEAM_BETA_PASSWORD}"
  fi
fi

echo "[install] Installing The Riftbreaker Dedicated Server (AppID: ${APP_ID})"
steamcmd \
  +force_install_dir "${INSTALL_DIR}" \
  +login anonymous \
  +app_update "${APP_ID}"${BETA_ARGS} validate \
  +quit

# Sanity checks
if [[ ! -f "/mnt/server/bin/DedicatedServer.exe" ]]; then
  echo "[install][error] Expected /mnt/server/bin/DedicatedServer.exe not found."
  echo "[install][hint] Check SteamCMD output above for errors, branch/password issues, or AppID changes."
  echo "[install][hint] Contents of /mnt/server:"; ls -la /mnt/server || true
  echo "[install][hint] Contents of /mnt/server/bin:"; ls -la /mnt/server/bin || true
  exit 1
fi

echo "[install] OK: DedicatedServer.exe found."

variables.name: Steam Beta Branch
variables.description: Optional Steam branch name. Leave blank for public. Only set this if EXOR tells you to use a specific branch.

variables.name: Steam Beta Password
variables.description: Optional password for the Steam beta branch (leave blank if none).
